titleStmt.title: Gallicantvs, seu Præcursor Gallicinii primus. Containing two addresses, the one to the King, the other to the Parliament. Tegether [sic] with a postscript about the affaires of religion, of most high concernment. By R. Lanceter, author of Gallicinivm, now in the presse.
titleStmt.author: Lanceter, R., 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nathaniel Ranew, at the sign of the Angell in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Angell in Pauls Church-yard
